title: [we are looking for you!] Come and trial for MYP!

embed.description: We are looking for you!] Come and trial for MYP! - League of Legends Recruiting, League of Legends 3v3. Posted 11th of May 2015

body:
Hey guys this is MJ, I am creating a ranked 5s team for competitive plays.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

BEFORE YOU APPLY OR COME TO OUR TRIAL SESSIONS 
READ BELOW:

1. Comment below the following :

Name : 
IGN (In Game Name) :
Age :(If not personal) :
Rank in Season 4 :
Rank in Season 5 (Currently) :
Rank in Season 3 (If possible) :
Preferred role :
Champion Pool :
SKYPE / TEAMSPEAK NEEDED.

Why do you wish to trial for MYP?

What makes you a better player?

2. We do not tolerate Toxicity in our teams.
If we find you being a poisonous frog, we will eject you out of our teams, no excuses.

Thank you all!

I wish to see you in my teams 

Cheers,

Cloud9 High

replies.body:
Name : Rhys
IGN (In Game Name) : Pandadude123
Age :(If not personal) : 16
Rank in Season 4 : B2
Rank in Season 5 (Currently) : B1
Preferred role : Top Lane :D
Champion Pool (i assume it means top lane champ pool that i can play well): Rek'Sai, Garen, Lissandra, Maokai, Sion, Vladamir, Wukong, Cho'gath, Zed, Malphite
SKYPE / TEAMSPEAK NEEDED: i have both

Why do you wish to trial for MYP: It's been a while since I've been in a competitive type Ranked team and I'm looking to get back into it. MYP looks like the perfect place to start and to always challenge myself.

What makes you a better player: A nice friendly and helpful team, good communication and my jungler :P

SKYPE / TEAMSPEAK NEEDED.
Have both

Why do you wish to trial for MYP?
I want to be a part of an active competitive environment and believe that playing with 4 other people consistently could help me improve my gameplay.

What makes you a better player?
My desire to win and positive attitude in the face of a challenge.
